text: Asteroids discovered: 1 76 Freia 21 October 1862 Heinrich Louis d'Arrest (13 July 1822 â€“ 14 June 1875) was a Prussian astronomer, born in Berlin. His name is sometimes given as Heinrich Ludwig d'Arrest. He died in Copenhagen, Denmark. ==Further reading== * ==Other websites== * Awarding of RAS gold medal: MNRAS 35 (1875) 265 ===Obituaries=== * AN 86 (1875) 63/64 (one paragraph, in German) * MNRAS 36 (1876) 155 Category:1822 births Category:1875 deaths Category:German astronomers Category:Scientists from Berlin
title: Heinrich Louis d'Arrest
